testcase.classname: validating functionality of Adactin hotel website.
testcase.name: validating login functionality with valid user name and invalid password.
testcase.system-out: Given user is on adactin website............................................passed When user should enter user name and password...............................passed And user should click login button..........................................passed When user should select the location,hotel,room type,no of rooms,check in date , checkout date,adults per room and children per room.passed And user should click search button.........................................passed When user should select hotel...............................................passed Then user should click continue button.....................................passed When user enters firstname,lastname,billing address,cardtype,cardno,expiry date,cvv no.passed And user should click book now button.......................................passed Then order no should be generated...........................................passed
